# R basics

In this chapter we will introduce to the R basics and some exercises to get familiar to how R works.

## Simple things

```{r}
1+1
```

```{r}
c(1, 2, 3)
c(1:3)
```

```{r}
a = data.frame(
  var1 = c(1:3),
  var2 = c("alpha", "beta", "gama")
)
a

View(a)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
b = c(1:3, 50:100)
b
summary(b)
```
